name: Optical Delusions
description:
Escape from... The Dungeon of Optical Delusions!

You play as the red square, beginning in the top left. Avoid the grey enemies... if you can see them. Use the arrow keys to move. Purple squares are safe, the grey enemies can't get you when you're on them. Get to the green square in the bottom right to escape. Press Z to skip a turn, you can use this strategically to avoid enemies.

Made for TriJam with the theme of Optical Illusion in less than 3 hours.
